body.name: Flolinda Queen Size Platform Bed Frame with Velvet Upholstered Headboard and Wooden Slats Support, Fully Upholstered Mattress Foundation/No Box Spring Needed/Easy Assembly, Cream White
features: 【Elegant Velvet Queen Bed Frame】Flolinda bed frame with classical upholstered platform design, give your bedroom or guest room a beautiful and warm look. The soft and comfortable bed headboard brings the instantly relaxed feeling, forget your fatigue and enjoy every quiet night's sleep.

【Heavy Duty and Sturdy Structure】The side and center part use widened metal bed frame queen "+" cross sturdy structure to provide dense and powerful support for the 800 lb weight. The design of curved wood slats increases the load-bearing capacity compared with the general straight slats. The central leg support of the platform bed frame can prevent the bed mattress from sagging and extend the life of your mattress.

【Special Slats & Noise-free】The unique locking structure allows each wooden bar to be steadily fixed to the pillars of the bed frame queen size. Compared with the Velcro wood slats structure, it can effectively reduce the swaying of the platform bed frame queen, no more squeaking sound, giving you a quiet sleep environment all night long.

【Queen Bed Frame no Box Spring Needed】The 37" raised queen size bed frame with headboard is designed to fit most of the thickness of mattress. Abandon box springs, you can save more money and time. This upholstered bed frame suitable for all kinds of mattresses, spring, memory foam, latex, or hybrid mattress. Give you most of the choice freedom.

【Smartly Packed】Flolinda queen bed frame with headboard adopts a special patented technology to optimize the packaging size. It is very convenient to carry and store. You can even put it into the car's trunk directly, the compact package is very convenient for transportation!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good price and easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: It took me approximately 2 1/2 hours to assemble the frame together alone. I thought it would’ve taken longer, but the instructions were clear and all the pieces were labeled correctly. The frame itself, is sturdy, lightweight, and the beige fabric is pretty. I will say, the headboard is thin, so if you like a thicker headboard that might be something to consider. Aside from that, it’s affordable, looks chic and construction is fine. Overall, I’m satisfied with the purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Regal Addition to My Bedroom!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Queen Bed Frame, and I must say, I'm absolutely thrilled with my purchase. This bed frame has exceeded my expectations in every way. The first thing that caught my eye was its elegant design - the intricate details and the tasteful finish give it a truly regal look that adds a touch of sophistication to my bedroom.Assembly was a breeze, thanks to the clear instructions provided. The sturdy construction of the bed frame gives me confidence in its durability and long-lasting quality. I appreciate how well it supports my mattress, providing a comfortable and peaceful night'sOne of the standout features of this bed frame is how quiet it is. There's no creaking or squeaking, ensuring an undisturbed night's rest. Plus, the thoughtful design of the frame eliminates any sharp edges, so no more accidentally bumping into corners!Overall, I couldn't be happier with my Queen Bed Frame purchase. It has transformed my bedroom into a luxurious oasis, and I find myself looking forward to bedtime just to experience the comfort and style it offers. If you're in the market for a bed frame that combines beauty, durability, and functionality, I wholeheartedly recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality frame for the price
reviews.reviewText: The Bedframe is exactly what I had hoped for. It is elegant, sleek and affordable. The assembly was easy once I realized all the tools for assembly were also included.

reviews.reviewerName: Carolyn Van Valien Carolyn Van Valien
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute bed frame!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this bedframe for my 8 year old daughter and it is very nice. I just put it together and did it all by myself. It took awhile, but overall, it was fairly simple. The instructions could use improvement because it just has picture steps and can be confusing. There are 2 holes and screws that I couldn't get to go in when connecting the 2 headboard pieces together, so I left them out. I'm not sure how long this bed will last, but it seems pretty sturdy. It is definitely not solid wood, so the quality is what you would expect at this price point. I didn't like that shipping wasn't free with Prime. The velvet is soft and beautiful. There are also a lot of support slats that is a nice feature. I used a standard twin box spring and mattress, so it's a bit high and bouncy with the curved slats. The mattresses I have are also slightly larger than this bedframe. This frame is a platform bed. I personally don't like a platform, but this was the only available frame I could find with this fabric and style. It does work though. My daughter likes it and I also got the comforter on Amazon. I'll update this review after using for a few months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for our Guest Room
reviews.reviewText: Affordable and Easy to assemble! I get so many compliments when guest come over. It is very sturdy and exactly what I was looking for!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing and soft
reviews.reviewText: It took me a minute to build but it was worth it. It works amazing I recommend , the headboard is so soft . NO NOISE!!! It’s very quiet which was one of my concerns but I really do love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect bed
reviews.reviewText: We love our new bedWe’ve been using it for about 9months nowI never have a bad nights sleepIt looks beautifulAnd feel luxurious but not too overstatedWe got green velvet curtains to match and are going to decorate more dark academiaLove the bed !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great quality for the price!
reviews.reviewText: The onlyyyy reason I took 1 star off from 5 is because the headboard was a b*** to put together LOL the holes for the nails like weren’t lining up correctly we had to basically fight and push to get them lined up and screwed in. But the rest of the bed was super simple to setup & assemble. Only have slept on it one night but it seems very sturdy so far & the headboard is shorter than the picture looks but it works! We love it. I’d recommend especially for the affordable price it is.
